title: idu unakku taghumO
sahitya:
idu unakku taghumO en ayyanE idu unakku taghumO


anupallavi

  podu maraip-poruLenap-pOTri sheivAr unnaip-pOr sheyyum mathangaLai pArinirp-paDaittEn


caraNam    viLaiyum AnandattAl viyan bhuviyAkkinai viLaiyATTE vinaiyAga vEndu naDAttinai
kaLaiyAna ulagilE kavalaiyum tuyaramum kaNNIrum puNNIrum kAN manam kalangudE
